column4: hi could anyone help me with installing a PDA software to my ubuntu?
went to go get my PDA...it's a tungsten E plam
it's an awesome PDA...just can't install it to my computer...
can you tell me how you installed it?
I have no idea where to start...
i though the install program would run automatically...
can you tell me what you mean by that?
proceed with the tool and you'll know:)
